testcase.name: Verify Go1Percent logo, carousel images, carousel captions and footer message
Verify carousel tag line with text"Get 1% Better Everyday "is displayed
Verify that carousel image changes while clicking on carousel button
Verify login page heading contains text "Sign in to Go 1%"
Verify specific text between login options is present
Verify microsoft logo redirects to microsoft login page
Verify Remember Me checkbox is selected during login
Verify login with invalid credentials with an alert message
Verify successful login with valid credentials

failure.message: Testing if the URL is 'https://nashtechglobal.qa.go1percent.com/my-dashboard' in 5000ms - expected "is 'https://nashtechglobal.qa.go1percent.com/my-dashboard'" but got: "https://auth.go1percent.com/auth/realms/nashtech/login-actions/authenticate?execution=cb36f633-2f8f-4b2b-b694-30cc71983e40&client_id=leaderboard-qa-ui&tab_id=CHgthkrDvT8" (5166ms)
